answers.answer: Hi.  I'm not a medical professional, just the parent of a kid with diabetes.  The volunteers here are more knowledgeable on type 1 diabetes, and not type 2, but the methods of testing are similar.  To test for type 2, either a fasting blood glucose test or an oral glucose tolerance test is conducted.  You just need to make an appointment with your doctor to make that happen.I'm not knowledgeable on removing stretch marks, sorry.  There is a dermitology forum where you might be able to find your answer:http://www.medhelp.org/forum_disclaimers/show/115Good luck.

question: I'm 22 years old (male) i have VERY obvious stretch marks running vertically on both my hips and have had them for at least 5 years. title: Do i have type 2 diabetes?
